body: The Voice of the Taino People Online is proud to tell the story of "Pearl Diane Williams...the first indigenous Kalinago Carib person from Waitikubuli (Dominica) and possibly the Eastern Caribbean to be admitted to the Bar in the Commonwealth of Dominica."
original_body: The Voice of the Taino People Online is proud to tell the story of "Pearl Diane Williams...the first indigenous Kalinago Carib person from Waitikubuli (Dominica) and possibly the Eastern Caribbean to be admitted to the Bar in the Commonwealth of Dominica."
title: Dominica: First Indigenous Lawyer
